flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to replace lights in the bedroom, bathroom, kitchen and basement so 2+1+1+4 = <<2+1+1+4=12>>12 lightbulbs
In the garage, he needs to replace half that amount so he needs 12/2 = <<12/2=6>>6 lightbulbs
All total, he needs 12+6 = <<12+6=18>>18 light bulbs
They come 2 per pack and he needs 18 lightbulbs so he needs 18/2 = <<18/2=9>>9 packs of lightbulbs
#### 9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
